body_html:
Right, but the change here seems more than just plugging those leaks. Why bother with TF_NewBufferFromString? Can't we reduce the change in this file to 2 lines:

if (!throwExcpetionIfNotOK(env, status)) {
  env->ReleaseByteArrayElemenst(config, cconfig, JNI_ABORT);
  TF_DeleteSessionOptions(opts);
  TF_DeleteStatus(status);
  return 0;
}

?
